channel.title: Any rules broken in this section results in
channel.description:
an instant mute and depending what mood i am in or how many times you have done it, ill ban you.
Rules are there for a reason. If i see one time posters posting some server thats not theres or that is RS2, you will be banned.
Also your topic will be locked, and the first post will be cleared.

item.title: Any rules broken in this section results in
item.dc:creator: @pesterd pesterd
item.description:
@pesterd wrote:

I can just sit here all day and laugh about your stupidity and the incoherent and irrelevant things you say because absolutely no one is really interested in hearing your sob stories.

The “Status”= You were doing it to elevate yourself from the regular members of moparscape.

(Now I hope you understand what status means)
And as a side point you showed to everyone that your a complete dim witted fool.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @lolwut44 lolwut44
item.description:
@lolwut44 wrote:

[quote=“pesterd, post:19, topic:262248”]So its a game to you, whoever has the MOST accounts??
Grow up kid… and same way I have been here Late 2008. ive been here since 2007 on earlier accounts and i DO know you and I also know that your a moron.[/quote]You don’t know fuck all about me if you don’t have my MSN.

Read full topic

item.title: Any rules broken in this section results in
item.dc:creator: @lolwut44 lolwut44
item.description:
@lolwut44 wrote:

[quote=“pesterd, post:17, topic:262248”]have fun getting banned on this one and making a 12th account because you were putting on a show just to get moderator… your bipolar and only did it for the status. so I suggest you stop talking because your making yourself look even worse then you already are.[/quote]I’m not bipolar, you don’t even know me you little kid so shut the fuck up. You joined in LATE 2008, I joined in EARLY 2006. I didn’t do anything for “the status” (whatever the fuck that is). You have no right to judge me, you’ve only been here for like 3 months, I’ve been here for 3 years, you don’t know fuck all so go away. I’m back on my 10th account, it got unbanned recently, eventually I’ll move onto my 12th account, but rog3r is still beating me with 14 accs.

Read full topic

item.source: Any rules broken in this section results in

item.title: Any rules broken in this section results in
item.dc:creator: @wat72 wat72
item.description:
@wat72 wrote:

[quote=“m.dog311, post:15, topic:262248”][quote author=xEnt link=topic=346339.msg2670466#msg2670466 date=1234804380]

[quote author=wat72 link=topic=346339.msg2670375#msg2670375 date=1234801725]

moparscape moderator is a side job, i also play god in real life.
[/quote]Okay mr. ego, but you’re just a sectional mod. Fail decision is fail on behalf of the admins. Why should a sectional mod be able to ban when a full moparscape moderator, and even senior moparscape moderators, can’t ban?

bigh51 don’t be upset because you lost mod or were not trusted with ban powers. I’m sure Lothy has a good reason for us to have ban powers.
[/quote]I’m not upset, I’m seriously laughing in real life at the decisions of the admins. Why the hell would they give a JUNIOR SECTIONAL MODERATOR the ability to BAN when some SENIOR FULL MOPARSCAPE MODERATORS can’t BAN? That’s just fucking retarded.

Moparscape moderators can ban can’t they? just not in RSC sections.

Only some of us

[quote author=wat72 link=topic=346339.msg2671588#msg2671588 date=1234842368]

wat72 its no wonder why the de modded u…

did u check your attitude lately??

ITS RETARDED
[/quote]Lmao, I didn’t act like this back when I was a mod. When I was a mod, I actually cared about the community and showed it, now I couldn’t give a half a shit, I only come on here to troll and see how far development is.

Don’t lie. You’ve actually calmed down since you were mod.[/quote]Hahaha, I’ve been trolling these forums on multiple accounts since I got demodded so I wouldn’t say I “calmed down”. I’m on my 11th account, even though my 10th was unbanned recently :). I was a good moderator until you came along and fucked everything over. Go back to rs2, you worthless piece of shit.

Read full topic

Moparscape moderators can ban can’t they? just not in RSC sections.[/quote]
Only some of us

[quote=“wat72, post:14, topic:262248”][quote author=pesterd link=topic=346339.msg2671551#msg2671551 date=1234841125]

did u check your attitude lately??

ITS RETARDED
[/quote]Lmao, I didn’t act like this back when I was a mod. When I was a mod, I actually cared about the community and showed it, now I couldn’t give a half a shit, I only come on here to troll and see how far development is.[/quote]
Don’t lie. You’ve actually calmed down since you were mod.
